entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 5:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
